review: I am completely satisfied with the quality and usability of the Fire Stick! We recently got rid of DirectTV and will not go back! The ability to choose programs that are commercial-free is priceless!The only cons are....... 1) tiny remote, easy to lose & 2) if the remote is accidentally touched, it will stop or change the show.The Fire Stick phone app is amazing! However,  For future upgrades, I would suggest a lanyard attachment for ease of storing or locating!!??
